summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York forwarding two letters received from a civilian regarding the Epstein/Maxwell case to the attention of recipients 'Hi and M'. It demonstrates external communication being routed to prosecutors.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email who is forwarding two letters from a civilian regarding the Epstein/Maxwell case to the attention of 'Hi and M'.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney received two letters from a civilian regarding the Epstein/Maxwell case.
The correspondence was forwarded to the attention of individuals referred to as 'Hi and M' on September 3, 2020.
The communication originated from the U.S. Attorney's Office at 1 St. Andrew's Plaza in New York, NY.
The document shows external tips or information from the public being routed to prosecutors handling the case.
